channel.title: Leon Morten Richter
channel.description: Recent content on Leon Morten Richter

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi my name is Leon and I’m currently studying computer science at the Christian-Albrechts-University in Kiel, Germany. I have a strong preference for coding in Python and am mainly interested in Backend development and prototyping. I love clean, well structured and simple code and enjoy the aesthetics of such solutions for complex problems. I’m familiar with most of today’s technologies down to the protocol level. I would describe myself as a Backend Developer, because everything Frontend related doesn’t really catch my attention (even though I know about plain HMTL/CSS/JS).

item.title: Contact
item.description: Let’s have a chat. Email me.

item.title: Projects
item.description: PricePicker This project aims to provide a simple yet good-looking price overview for repairshops that offer various kinds of services around Smartphones and Tablets. Technologies used: Flask Docker Redis Postgres Socket Chess A basic chess game based on Websockets. Technologies used: Java Spring Websockets SockJS Bilbo the Bot Bilbo is an extensible Slack-bot with an Integration for Papershift and a sense of humor. Technologies used:
